title: English County Championship Division One Scoreboard
text: May 4, 2018 / 5:55 PM / Updated 3 hours ago English County Championship Division One Scoreboard Reuters Staff 4 Scoreboard at stumps on the first day of between Essex and Yorkshire on Friday at
